content.content: 1. (1) Every arbitrator shall, within 10 days after issuing an award, file a copy of the award with the Minister in the form specified by the Minister. (2) The Minister shall publish the copies of awards filed under subsection (1) or otherwise make them available to the public. (3) For greater certainty, the Minister may satisfy the obligation set out in subsection (2) by publishing the copies on a Government of Ontario website.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Every arbitrator shall, within 10 days after issuing an award, file a copy of the award with the Minister in the form specified by the Minister.

(2) The Minister shall publish the copies of awards filed under subsection (1) or otherwise make them available to the public.

(3) For greater certainty, the Minister may satisfy the obligation set out in subsection (2) by publishing the copies on a Government of Ontario website.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
